subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Teemu Selanne, the Anaheim Ducks’ veteran wing, and Luc Robitaille, an executive with the Los Angeles Kings, have long been adored in Southern California.
snippet: Teemu Selanne, the Anaheim Ducks’ veteran wing, and Luc Robitaille, an executive with the Los Angeles Kings, have long been adored in Southern California.
